returns._0: The address of the destination escrow.
The address of the source escrow.

deployDstEscrow(address,uint256,uint256,.details: The caller must send the safety deposit in the native token along with the function call and approve the destination token to be transferred to the created escrow.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.safetyDeposit: The safety deposit amount in native tokens.
params.token: The token address to be deposited.

params.makingAmount: The amount of tokens to be filled.
params.safetyDeposit: The safety deposit amount in native tokens.

returns._0: The address of the destination escrow implementation.
The address of the source escrow implementation.

addressOfEscrowDst(bytes32).notice: Returns the address of the destination escrow.

addressOfEscrowSrc(bytes32).notice: Returns the address of the source escrow.

deployDstEscrow(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Creates a new escrow contract for taker on the destination chain.

deploySrcEscrow(bytes32,address,address,.notice: Creates a new source escrow contract.

getEscrowDstImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the destination escrow implementation.

getEscrowSrcImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the source escrow implementation.
